title: Mobile Microlearning Course on Surgical Problem-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Mobile-based intensive training course for current professionals, providing a flexible learning environment using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can establish appropriate surgical strategies with 80% accuracy by analyzing trauma patient case studies.
Learners can explain a decision-making process with four or more stages for resolving complex trauma cases using multimedia resources (video/text).
Learners can document and submit management strategies for trauma cases presented in problem-solving questionnaires within 30 minutes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
